entry.title: Blogzkrieg
entry.content:
I have decided to write 180 posts in the next 180 days.

My desire to write better was the reason for starting this blog, which I did over eight months ago. Who knows what happened between then and now. I have recently noticed an increasing muddiness behind my thoughts, and for what it’s worth, I’m hoping to clear that out by continuously sharing ideas.

I was more immediately inspired by Jennifer Dewalt’s brilliant post and the comments at hacker news. Let’s see how this turns out!

entry.title: Hello,
entry.content: World! Now you can expect some very very mundane posts.
